Government Tender Announcement
***************************************************
### F3065-240001: CCGS Des Groseilliers, Refit – Spring 2024
***************************************************

**Publication Details**

*   Solicitation Number:  WS4447548313
*   Reference Number:  Doc4447594113
*   Amendment Number: 2
*   Publication Date: 2024-02-29
*   Tender Closing Date: 2024-03-28 14:00:00

**Procurement Details**

*   Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
*   Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
*   Procurement Method: Competitive – Open Bidding
*   Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

**Contracting Entity**

*   Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

**End User Entity**

*   Canadian Coast Guard (CCG) / Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)
*   Contact Information: Gabriel Piras, gabriel.piras@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Bid Description**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Canadian Coast Guard (CCG) is soliciting bids for the refit of the Canadian Coast Guard Ship (CCGS) Des Groseilliers. The ship is located in Quebec City, QC. Bidders are required to provide all the necessary equipment and work to complete the refit as outlined in Annex A.

**Terms and Conditions**

*   A mandatory site visit will not be conducted.
*   Bids are to be submitted electronically through the procurement website.

**Schedule**

*   Expected Contract Start Date: April 1, 2024
*   Expected Contract End Date: October 1, 2024

**Trade Agreements**

*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Relevant UNSPSC Codes
*   *Commercial marine craft*
*   *Salvage ships*
*   *Icebreaker*
*   *Rescue ships or boats*
*   *Water transport vessel maintenance and repair services*

To participate in this bid, please visit the procurement website. If you have any questions or concerns, please contact Gabriel Piras at gabriel.piras@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca. [Bid Notice URL](https://discovery.ariba.com/r
